Package management

Class Board

java.lang.Object
management.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Class to manage the entire level, it stock all the element use in the enigma and manage the element each other.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Board​(int widthBoard, int heightBoard)
    Set the constructor to create a board which contains his width and height, a board will contains a set, we can add an element to this.

      Set the constructor to create a board which contains his width and height, a board will contains a set, we can add an element to this.

      heightBoard - height of the board

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add​(Element element)
      Add an element in the set of the board
      Parameters:

    • contactProperties

      public void contactProperties​(Property first, Property second)
      Checks if an element is in contact with another and remove the location depending on the property given in parameter.
      Parameters:
      first - property to manage with the second
      second - property to manage with the first

    • removeSink

      public void removeSink()
      Remove the location of two element if one element is in contact with an element which has "Sink" as property.

    • isContact

      public boolean isContact()
      To know if there is a conflict
      Returns:
      true if there is a conflict between two element or if an element is in conflict with itself else return false.

    • isYouLeft

      public boolean isYouLeft()
      To know if one ELement has the property "You" in the board
      Returns:
      true if there still is an Element with the property "You" in the board, else return false.

    • getElementByMaterial

      public Element getElementByMaterial​(Material data)
      Get the element in the board which has "data" as material.
      Parameters:
      data - of the wanted Element.
      Returns:
      the element which has the material "data".

    • passNextLevel

      public boolean passNextLevel()
      To check if the player won or not
      Returns:
      true if the user won the level, false if he is still playing.

    • contactWin

      public boolean contactWin​(Coordinate locationYou)
      To check if the player is on an Element who have the property You
      Parameters:
      locationYou - : location of the elements "you", to check if he is in contact with an element "Win"
      Returns:
      true if there is an element you in contact with an element Win, else return false.

    • setRules

      public void setRules()
      Set all the rules which make a sentences in the board, it also put the property "Push" to all the text in the board.

    • getElementByCoordinate

      public Element getElementByCoordinate​(Coordinate coordinate)
      Parse the gameBoard and return the Element in the "coordinate" taken as a parameter.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the Element in the position of the target coordinate

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Checks if the given location is off of the board or not
      Parameters:
      location - the given location
      Returns:
      true if the given location is off the board

    • elementPushElement

      public Element elementPushElement​(Element pusher, Element you)
      Parse the list of the element and check if an element is in contact with the element pusher, if yes, return the element which is being push.
      Parameters:
      pusher - which is in contact of the Element of the push
      you - : Element which has the property You in the game
      Returns:
      the Element which is pushed by the Element pusher
